secondaries.shortDescription: When a CHARACTER or unit champion is destroyed by a melee made by a HIVE TENDRIL, gain a command point dependning on a D6 roll and score victory points

subObjectives.description: Roll D6 if you killed a CHARACTER or UNIT CHAMPION with a HIVE TENDRIL melee attack. Add 2 if FEEDER TENDRILS keyword, 2 if CHARACTER. On 6+ gain a CP
you gained 1 or more Command points during the battle due to this secondary objective.
for each enemy unit champion that is destroyed, if it was destroyed by a melee attack made by a HIVE TENDRIL model from your army.
for each enemy CHARACTER unit that is destroyed, if it was destroyed by a melee attack made by a HIVE TENDRIL model from your army.
if the enemy WARLORD is destroyed, if it was destroyed by a melee attack made by a FEEDER TENDRILS model from your army.

secondaries.shortDescription: Keep a Synaptic Kill tally, reset to 0 at the start of the battle round. Gain points based on the wound of the enemy model you killed

subObjectives.description: score 3 victory points if your Synaptic Kill points tally is 5s or more.
If enemy model destroyed by a SYNAPSE model from your army had a Wounds characteristic of 3-5, gain 1 Synaptic Kill point.
If enemy model destroyed by a SYNAPSE model from your army had a Wounds characteristic of 6-9, gain 2 Synaptic Kill point.
If enemy model destroyed by a SYNAPSE model from your army had a Wounds characteristic of 10+, gain 3 Synaptic Kill point.

secondaries.shortDescription: HIVE TENDRIL troops can attempt Seed Spore Node (From end of movement up to end of turn)

subObjectives.description: a unit from your army completes this action
